text: Molarity and molality of a solution of NaOH is calculated. If now temperature of the solution is increased then which of the following statement(s) is/are correct?  (i) Molarity of solution decreases  (ii) Molality of the solution increases
hint: Molarity include volume thus with increase intemperature increasesâ€™ volume increases, hence molarity decreases while in case of molality mass of solvent is taken, which is not effected by temperature.
